game.controller

Class FarmController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.controller.FarmController

  • public class FarmController
extends java.lang.Object
    A FarmController responds to commands by FarmMenu and execute these commands on the entity

      • harvest

        public java.util.ArrayList<Harvest> harvest()
        Goes through all of the player's plots and harvests all crops that are ready for harvest. Increments player's gold and xp
        Returns:
        list of harvests

      • tryLevelUp

        public Rank tryLevelUp()
        Checks to see if the player has enough xp to level up. If true, levels up the player and adds new plots to his farm, and returns the new Rank. Otherwise, return null.
        Returns:
        the new rank if level up, otherwise null.

      • clear

        public boolean clear(int plotNo)
        Clears the plot with the specified plot number.
        Parameters:
        plotNo - the plot number of the plot to be cleared
        Returns:
        true if cleared successfully, false if there is no wilted plant to clear
